predictions.text: By 2025-11-07, the U.S. Treasury, White House, or Commerce will announce a finalized agreement resolving TikTok’s U.S. operations (asset sale or restructuring) in an official press release naming TikTok/ByteDance.
predictions.verification_criteria: A dated press release from U.S. Treasury, White House, or Commerce explicitly stating a finalized deal concerning TikTok/ByteDance’s U.S. operations. Media reports alone are insufficient without an official release.
monitoring_signals: U.S. Treasury/White House daily schedules and press advisories
Credible leaks from WSJ/Bloomberg/FT detailing terms
predictions.rationale: Officials signal a near-term resolution aligned to the Trump–Xi meeting.

predictions.text: At the late-October 2025 FOMC meeting, the Federal Reserve will leave the target federal funds rate range unchanged.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare the target range in the FOMC statement released on the meeting date with the prior target range; unchanged means both bounds are identical.
predictions.rationale: Softer inflation and market pricing point to a hold.

predictions.text: Nikkei 225 (^N225) will close at or above 50,000.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Yahoo Finance (^N225) or Nikkei official daily closing price shows a close >= 50,000.0 on or before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: USD/JPY levels and BOJ policy guidance
Trade and tariff headlines impacting Japan
predictions.rationale: Index momentum and favorable macro tailwinds support a close above 50,000.

predictions.text: China NBS Industrial Profits (YoY, single-month) for October 2025 will print at or above +15.0% in the official release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use the single-month YoY growth rate for October from the National Bureau of Statistics industrial profits release (not the cumulative YTD measure).
monitoring_signals: Export growth data and shipping volumes
Credit impulse and fiscal support measures
predictions.rationale: Manufacturing recovery and price stabilization buoy profits.

predictions.text: Insured losses from Hurricane Melissa will be estimated at or above $5.0 billion by at least one catastrophe modeler by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: A press release or report from Moody’s RMS, Verisk/PCS, or CoreLogic that explicitly cites an insured loss estimate ≥ $5B for Hurricane Melissa.
monitoring_signals: Utility outage and infrastructure damage assessments
predictions.rationale: Rapid intensification over warm waters raises severe loss risk.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, DHS/ICE will publish a new or updated Privacy Impact Assessment or System of Records Notice explicitly describing AI-enabled social media monitoring.
predictions.verification_criteria: A document posted on DHS Privacy (dhs.gov/privacy) or the Federal Register that names ICE and describes AI-enabled social media monitoring; publication date on or before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: ICE procurement/award notices to AI/social media vendors
Congressional oversight letters referencing ICE social media tools
predictions.rationale: Reporting indicates imminent deployment; governance documents typically follow.

predictions.text: HSBC will report Q3 2025 profit before tax declining by at least 15% year-over-year in its results announcement.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare Q3 2025 profit before tax with Q3 2024 in HSBC’s official results press release or presentation; decline must be ≥ 15%.
monitoring_signals: Scale of litigation provisions and one-offs
Net interest margin and fee trends
FX translation impacts on reported figures
predictions.rationale: A $1.1B provision materially pressures quarterly profit.

predictions.text: Novartis will announce a definitive agreement to acquire Avidity Biosciences by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Official press releases from Novartis and Avidity or an Avidity Form 8-K stating a signed definitive merger agreement.
monitoring_signals: Trading halts and media reports with final price
Retention of antitrust counsel and deal advisors
predictions.rationale: Advanced talks and strategic fit in RNA therapeutics support near-term signing.

predictions.text: Canada will publish in the Canada Gazette, Part II, an order imposing a surtax under the Customs Tariff on specified U.S. goods by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Publication of the surtax order in Canada Gazette, Part II, listing covered U.S. goods and effective date. Department of Finance notices alone are insufficient without Gazette publication.
monitoring_signals: Department of Finance Canada consultation notices
predictions.rationale: Ottawa is signaling retaliation; formal surtaxes typically appear in the Gazette.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas will settle at or above €45.00/MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: ICE Endex official daily settlement price for the front-month TTF contract on or before the deadline is ≥ €45.00/MWh.
monitoring_signals: LNG supply disruptions and regas capacity
predictions.rationale: Early-winter demand or supply hiccups can spike front-month prices.
